TopicTitle: Is it possible to revert to previous version of KSP?

Articles.Content:
I am basically just curious if it is possible to revert my 0.90 version of KSP to the 0.25 version or later? I purchased the game on steam, but cannot find anything that looks like it will take me back in game versions.

Any Ideas would be appreciated. thank u B-)

Edited December 28, 2014 by Ckay4ever

Yes, but you can't go back to any version other than the version immediately prior to the current release.

If you open KSP's Properties from the Steam Library, you can go to the Betas tab and select the Previous Stable Release option.

If there is some issue that arises, it may be that Steam did not completely roll things back properly (sometimes there might be some glitched parts that decide to stick around, for example), and the first thing you can try there is to remove the contents of the GameData folder before having Steam run an integrity check in order to redownload the missing parts.

ok... so yesterday when i checked the beta tab in the properties, that option wasnt even there... only options that were available were "Opt out of beta". But just now when i read your reply, and checked again, it is magically there......... im speechless. i dunno how that happened. but anywho, thanks.
